swf.name: BodyFromGraphic
swf.short: Demonstrating MarchingSquares to generate bodies from graphics and bitmaps.

long.text: Demonstraing MarchingSquares to generate bodies from graphics and bitmaps as well as correctly aligning said graphics to the nape bodies for drawing. Debug draw is overlayed with a small alpha to display actual nape shapes generated
The sherlock.png graphic can be found in the github repository
